articles.description: Initially, two parties - L&amp;T-MHI and BHEL - participated in the bidding process. But finally, in the price bid only BHEL participated. We are not aware of any specific reason for L&amp;T backing out, said Prasanna Kumar Motupalli.
articles.content: Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd (BHEL) has emerged as the only bidder for NLC India's ultra-supercritical thermal power plant project at Talabira, Odisha, NLC India Chairman and Managing Director Prasan… [+2409 chars]

articles.title: PLI scheme for automotive industry extended till FY2028 - The Financial Express
articles.description: The amendment also includes changes to the table indicating the incentive outlay, with the total indicative incentive amounting to Rs 25,938 crore.
articles.content:

articles.title: Should you buy or rent property in 2024? - Hindustan Times
